medical_history.chief_complaint: 1 week of worsening epigastric abdominal pain
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began 1 week ago and have been getting worse. The pain is described as radiating centrally into the chest, aggravated by food, and inhibits sleep. Associated symptoms include nausea without emesis, little appetite, and a weight loss of approximately 9 lbs in the last month. Patient has experienced nonbloody watery diarrhea episodes daily for the past 3 weeks. Reports no fevers but had an episode of chills last night.
medical_history.family_history: Hypertension in both parents and siblings; father with heart problems, mother with diabetes.
medical_history.social_history: Denies alcohol consumption, recent travel, or camping.
